title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 133 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 133 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!
lineList.cn: （大卫上行之诗）看哪，弟兄和睦同居，是何等地善，何等地美。

lineList.en: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;
lineList.cn: 这好比那贵重的油，浇在亚伦的头上，流到胡须，又流到他的衣襟。

lineList.en: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
lineList.cn: 又好比黑门的甘露，降在锡安山。因为在那里有耶和华所命定的福，就是永远的生命。
